about.title: About Me
about.first_description: Front End Developer with experience in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, React Native, and Angular. I also have knowledge in Node.js and Express.js for Back End development. I am constantly seeking to learn and improve my skills.
about.second_description: My focus is on creating intuitive and engaging user experiences. I am communicative, collaborative, and take pride in writing clean code. I always stay up-to-date with the latest web development trends and actively participate in the developer community.

experiences.title: Potentiality Group
descriptions: Developed and maintained the main website 'www.iunigo.com.ar' (React, Next.js, Tailwindcss).
Developed and maintained the insured portal mobile app (Android - iOS) 'Iunigo' (React Native, React Native CLI).
Developed and maintained products with Guide Wire Cloud (React, bootstrap).
Developed and maintained the secure producer site for San Cristobal, Producer Portal in Argentina and Uruguay (Angular 16+, bootstrap).
Developed and maintained an automotive and home insurance quote tool in Argentina and Uruguay (Angular 16+, bootstrap).
experiences.stack: HTML - CSS - JS - TypeScript - React - React Native - NextJS - Angular - Firebase - Redux - Jest - Cypress - TailwindCSS - SCSS
